title: Fürth
summary: Fürth (German: [fʏʁt] (listen); East Franconian: Färdd; Yiddish: פיורדא‎, romanized: Fiurda) is a city in northern Bavaria, Germany, in the administrative division (Regierungsbezirk[3]) of Middle Franconia. It is now contiguous with the larger city of Nuremberg, the centres of the two cities being only seven km (4.3 mi) apart.
